SpeedOffset_-1.Name: Slowpoke
SpeedOffset_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is always falling behind the group whenever [PAWN_pronoun] goes anywhere.

SpeedOffset_1.Name: Fast walker
SpeedOffset_1.Description: [PAWN_name] likes to be where [PAWN_pronoun]'s going. [PAWN_pronoun] walks quicker than most people.

SpeedOffset_2.Name: Jogger
SpeedOffset_2.Description: [PAWN_name] always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.

DrugDesire_2.Name: Chemical fascination
DrugDesire_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

DrugDesire_1.Name: Chemical interest
DrugDesire_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

DrugDesire_-1.Name: Teetotaler
DrugDesire_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. [PAWN_pronoun] strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.

NaturalMood_2.Name: Sanguine
NaturalMood_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is just naturally upbeat about [PAWN_possessive] situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.

NaturalMood_1.Name: Optimist
NaturalMood_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get [PAWN_objective] down.

NaturalMood_-1.Name: Pessimist
NaturalMood_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] tends to look on the bad side of life.

NaturalMood_-2.Name: Depressive
NaturalMood_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is perenially unhappy. [PAWN_pronoun] has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.

Nerves_2.Name: Iron-willed
Nerves_2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s will is an iron shield. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.

Nerves_1.Name: Steadfast
Nerves_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.

Nerves_-2.Name: Volatile
Nerves_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is on a hair-trigger all the time. [PAWN_pronoun] is the first to break in any tough situation.

Neurotic_1.Name: Neurotic
Neurotic_1.Description: [PAWN_name] likes to have things squared away. [PAWN_pronoun] will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can get the better of [PAWN_objective].

Neurotic_2.Name: Very neurotic
Neurotic_2.Description: [PAWN_name] feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. [PAWN_pronoun] will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can easily get the better of [PAWN_objective].

Industriousness_2.Name: Industrious
Industriousness_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.

Industriousness_1.Name: Hard worker
Industriousness_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.

Industriousness_-2.Name: Slothful
Industriousness_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] loves idleness and hates anything productive. [PAWN_pronoun] moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.

PsychicSensitivity_2.Name: Psychically hypersensitive
PsychicSensitivity_2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind is like a psychic tuning fork. [PAWN_pronoun] is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.

PsychicSensitivity_1.Name: Psychically sensitive
PsychicSensitivity_1.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.

PsychicSensitivity_-1.Name: Psychically dull
PsychicSensitivity_-1.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind is psychically out of tune with others. [PAWN_pronoun] isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.

PsychicSensitivity_-2.Name: Psychically deaf
PsychicSensitivity_-2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. [PAWN_pronoun] just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.

ShootingAccuracy_1.Name: Careful shooter
ShootingAccuracy_1.Description: [PAWN_name] takes more time to aim when shooting. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.

ShootingAccuracy_-1.Name: Trigger-happy
ShootingAccuracy_-1.Description: Pew! Pew! Pew! [PAWN_name] just likes pulling the trigger. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots faster than others, but less accurately.

Beauty_2.Name: Beautiful
Beauty_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to [PAWN_objective] before [PAWN_pronoun] even opens [PAWN_possessive] mouth.

Beauty_1.Name: Pretty
Beauty_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like [PAWN_objective].

Beauty_-1.Name: Ugly
Beauty_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.

Beauty_-2.Name: Staggeringly ugly
Beauty_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is staggeringly ugly. [PAWN_possessive] face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at [PAWN_objective] while conversing.

Immunity_1.Name: Super-immune
Immunity_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a naturally powerful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.

Immunity_-1.Name: Sickly
Immunity_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] has an awful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.

Nudist_0.Name: Nudist
Nudist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. {PAWN_pronoun} can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.

Bloodlust_0.Name: Bloodlust
Bloodlust_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. {PAWN_pronoun} is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.

Kind_0.Name: Kind
Kind_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. {PAWN_pronoun} rarely insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also never judges people by their appearance. {PAWN_possessive} agreeableness also makes {PAWN_objective} more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.

Psychopath_0.Name: Psychopath
Psychopath_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother {PAWN_objective} at all. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also feels no mood boost from socializing.

Cannibal_0.Name: Cannibal
Cannibal_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, {PAWN_pronoun} tried it... and {PAWN_pronoun} liked it.

Abrasive_0.Name: Abrasive
Abrasive_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} always says exactly what's on {PAWN_possessive} mind, especially if it's bugging {PAWN_objective}. That tends to rub people the wrong way.

TooSmart_0.Name: Too smart
TooSmart_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is too smart for {PAWN_possessive} own good. {PAWN_pronoun} learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.

Brawler_0.Name: Brawler
Brawler_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to fight up close and personal. {PAWN_possessive} accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but {PAWN_pronoun}'ll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.

Masochist_0.Name: Masochist
Masochist_0.Description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, there's something exciting about getting hurt. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't know why, {PAWN_pronoun}'s just wired differently.

NightOwl_0.Name: Night owl
NightOwl_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

{PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.

Greedy_0.Name: Greedy
Greedy_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} needs a really impressive bedroom. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get what {PAWN_pronoun} wants.

Jealous_0.Name: Jealous
Jealous_0.Description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.

Ascetic_0.Name: Ascetic
Ascetic_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. {PAWN_pronoun} will become unhappy if {PAWN_pronoun} has a bedroom that's too impressive. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. {PAWN_pronoun} never judges others by their appearance.

Gay_0.Name: Gay
Gay_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to people of {PAWN_possessive} own gender.

Bisexual_0.Name: Bisexual
Bisexual_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to both men and women.

Asexual_0.Name: Asexual
Asexual_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.

AnnoyingVoice_0.Name: Annoying voice
AnnoyingVoice_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and {PAWN_pronoun} tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike {PAWN_objective}.

CreepyBreathing_0.Name: Creepy breathing
CreepyBreathing_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.

Pyromaniac_0.Name: Pyromaniac
Pyromaniac_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves fire. {PAWN_pronoun} will never extinguish fires, and will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. {PAWN_pronoun} will be happy around flames, and happier when wielding an incendiary weapon.

Wimp_0.Name: Wimp
Wimp_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize {PAWN_objective}.

Nimble_0.Name: Nimble
Nimble_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. {PAWN_pronoun} seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.

FastLearner_0.Name: Fast learner
FastLearner_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a knack for learning. {PAWN_pronoun} picks things up much faster than others.

SlowLearner_0.Name: Slow learner
SlowLearner_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is slow on the uptake. {PAWN_pronoun} learns much slower than others.

Undergrounder_0.Name: Undergrounder
Undergrounder_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no need to experience the outdoors or light. {PAWN_pronoun} will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever and is not bothered by darkness. However, {PAWN_nameDef} will be unhappy while outdoors.

Transhumanist_0.Name: Body modder
Transhumanist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels limited in {PAWN_possessive} feeble human body. {PAWN_pronoun} often dreams of being enhanced with artificial body parts or xenogenetics.

BodyPurist_0.Name: Body purist
BodyPurist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes the human body is limited for a reason. To {PAWN_objective}, artificial body parts and xenogenes are unethical and disgusting.

GreatMemory_0.Name: Great memory
GreatMemory_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a fantastic memory for detail. {PAWN_pronoun} will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.

Tough_0.Name: Tough
Tough_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. {PAWN_pronoun} is extremely hard to kill.

TorturedArtist_0.Name: Tortured artist
TorturedArtist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. {PAWN_pronoun} will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.

Gourmand_0.Name: Gourmand
Gourmand_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s life revolves around food. {PAWN_pronoun} gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.

QuickSleeper_0.Name: Quick sleeper
QuickSleeper_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether {PAWN_pronoun}'s sleeping on a bed or on the ground, {PAWN_pronoun} will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.

Delicate_0.Name: Delicate
Delicate_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has fragile skin and bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes more damage than other people from the same blows.

Recluse_0.Name: Recluse
Recluse_0.Description: The fewer people in {PAWN_nameDef}'s faction, the happier {PAWN_pronoun} is. Being alone is best of all.

PerfectMemory_0.Name: Perfect memory
PerfectMemory_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has outstanding memory, both in terms of retaining information but also muscle memory. {PAWN_possessive} skills will never decay.

Occultist_0.Name: Occultist
Occultist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has deep knowledge of the twisted patterns of dark psychic energy. {PAWN_pronoun} can study unnatural entities faster than others. {PAWN_pronoun} will also periodically teach this inhuman knowledge to others when {PAWN_pronoun} gets the chance.

Joyous_0.Name: Joyous
Joyous_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has the ability to make everyone feel better and inspire them to be the best version of themselves.

BodyMastery_0.Name: Body mastery
BodyMastery_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't have basic needs like eating, sleeping, or comfort. {PAWN_possessive} body is driven by some unknown mechanism, which has turned {PAWN_possessive} eyes completely white.

Disturbing_0.Name: Disturbing
Disturbing_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a peculiar person who seems fixated on horrendous ideas. Talking to {PAWN_objective} is often upsetting.

VoidFascination_0.Name: Void fascination
VoidFascination_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is strangely intrigued by unnatural entities and is easily enthralled by them.

VPE_Thrall_0.Name: Thrall
VPE_Thrall_0.Description: Psychic enthrallment caused by incredibly strong mental influence. Thralls don't need to sleep or have recreation, but are unable to do skilled work and engage in social interactions.

HAR_Xenophobia_1.Name: Xenophobe
HAR_Xenophobia_1.Description: [PAWN_name] hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.

HAR_Xenophobia_-1.Name: Xenophile
HAR_Xenophobia_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.

Cinder_Coke_0.Name: Coke
Cinder_Coke_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a part of an unknown consciousness. when others approach, they will feel a burning sensation

CleaningSpeedOffset_-1.Name: Slovenly
CleaningSpeedOffset_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is a messy person. [PAWN_pronoun] tends to leave dirt and trash where ever [PAWN_pronoun] goes and is slow to clean up after [PAWN_objective]self.

CleaningSpeedOffset_1.Name: Fastidious
CleaningSpeedOffset_1.Description: [PAWN_name] likes clean environments. [PAWN_pronoun] cleans quickly and avoids leaving dirt and trash.

FT_Charisma_1.Name: Charismatic
FT_Charisma_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a charismatic personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is good at social interactions and trading.

FT_Charisma_2.Name: Very charismatic
FT_Charisma_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has a very charismatic personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at social interactions and trading.

FT_Intimidation_1.Name: Intimidating
FT_Intimidation_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has an intimidating personality, this gives [PAWN_objective] an advantage in social interactions.

FT_Intimidation_2.Name: Very intimidating
FT_Intimidation_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has a very intimidating personality, this gives [PAWN_objective] a large advantage in social interactions.

FT_AimOffset_-1.Name: Poor aim
FT_AimOffset_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target more often in combat.

FT_AimOffset_1.Name: Steady aim
FT_AimOffset_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has good hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target less often in combat.

FT_AimOffset_2.Name: Great aim
FT_AimOffset_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has great hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target less often in combat.

FT_Artisan_0.Name: Artisan
FT_Artisan_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a skilled crafter with artistic finesse, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoys putting things together and [PAWN_pronoun]'s pretty good at it.

FT_IronStomach_0.Name: Iron stomach
FT_IronStomach_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has an iron stomach. [PAWN_pronoun] can go without eating longer and it takes more to upset [PAWN_possessive] stomach.

FT_Agility_1.Name: Agile
FT_Agility_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has good reflexes and moves with finesse. [PAWN_pronoun] will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.

FT_Agility_2.Name: Ninja
FT_Agility_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. [PAWN_pronoun] will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.

FT_Intelligence_1.Name: Intelligent
FT_Intelligence_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is more intelligent than average. [PAWN_pronoun] learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around [PAWN_objective].

FT_Intelligence_2.Name: Very intelligent
FT_Intelligence_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is very intelligent. [PAWN_pronoun] learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around [PAWN_objective].

FT_Perception_1.Name: Perceptive
FT_Perception_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings and has a good understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] actions affects others.

FT_Perception_2.Name: Very perceptive
FT_Perception_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is very aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings and has a great understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] actions affects others.

FT_Evasion_1.Name: Dodgy
FT_Evasion_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is good at doging things. [PAWN_pronoun] is good at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.

FT_Evasion_2.Name: Evasive
FT_Evasion_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is great at evading things. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.

FT_Scientific_1.Name: Scientific
FT_Scientific_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a scientific mind. [PAWN_pronoun] is a good researcher and a fast learner.

FT_Scientific_2.Name: Very scientific
FT_Scientific_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has a very scientific mind. [PAWN_pronoun] is a great researcher and a fast learner.

FT_Endurance_1.Name: Enduring
FT_Endurance_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has good health and an enduring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is better at handling stressful situations than others.

FT_Endurance_2.Name: Very enduring
FT_Endurance_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.

FT_Bargaining_1.Name: Bargainer
FT_Bargaining_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is great at bargaining. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at social interactions and can find great deals while trading.

FT_Bargaining_2.Name: Hard bargainer
FT_Bargaining_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is a hard bargainer. [PAWN_pronoun] is adept at social interactions and can find the best deals while trading.

FT_Inspiration_-1.Name: Uninspiring
FT_Inspiration_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] has an uninspiring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] has less motivation to learn and puts less effort into social interactions.

FT_Inspiration_1.Name: Inspirational
FT_Inspiration_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has an inspirational personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is good at social interactions and is a motivated learner .

FT_Inspiration_2.Name: Very inspirational
FT_Inspiration_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has a very inspirational personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at social interactions and is a very motivated learner.

FT_Generosity_1.Name: Generous
FT_Generosity_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is a generous person, sometimes to a fault. [PAWN_pronoun] is a good negotiator but often does so by offering more than [PAWN_pronoun] should.

FT_Generosity_2.Name: Overly generous
FT_Generosity_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is an overly generous person to a fault. [PAWN_pronoun] is a great negotiator but often does so by offering more than [PAWN_pronoun] should

FT_Scrapper_0.Name: Scrapper
FT_Scrapper_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is good at working with scrap metal. [PAWN_pronoun] is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.

FT_NaturalLeader_0.Name: Natural leader
FT_NaturalLeader_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a natural leader, [PAWN_pronoun] is good at social interactions and can handle stressful situations that others might not.

FT_RadResistant_1.Name: Rad resistant
FT_RadResistant_1.Description: [PAWN_name]'s body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.

FT_RadResistant_2.Name: Rad tolerant
FT_RadResistant_2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s body has built up a tolerance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.

FT_ActionBoy_0.Name: Action boy
FT_ActionBoy_0.Description: There's no time to waste! [PAWN_name] has increased movement and work speed.

FT_ActionGirl_0.Name: Action girl
FT_ActionGirl_0.Description: There's no time to waste! [PAWN_name] has increased movement and work speed.

FT_QuickHands_0.Name: Quick hands
FT_QuickHands_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has quick hands. When it comes to [PAWN_possessive] hands, [PAWN_name] never hesitates.

FT_GunNut_0.Name: Gun nut
FT_GunNut_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a gun nut, [PAWN_pronoun] loves guns so much that [PAWN_pronoun] gets a mood boost while holding a ranged weapon.

FT_Scrounger_0.Name: Scrounger
FT_Scrounger_0.Description: [PAWN_name] knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly, but if you think that's fast wait until you see [PAWN_pronoun] eat!

FT_Survivalist_0.Name: Survivalist
FT_Survivalist_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is survialist. [PAWN_pronoun] has a natural ability to survive some situations that others might not.

FT_Blitz_0.Name: Blitz
FT_Blitz_0.Description: [PAWN_name] finds the gap to make the tackle! [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly and gets the jobs done before anyone can react.

FT_Philanthropist_1.Name: Philanthropist
FT_Philanthropist_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is a philanthropist. [PAWN_pronoun] is generally good natured and cares for the welfare of others.

FT_HealingHands_0.Name: Healing hands
FT_HealingHands_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has healing hands. Whether it's for patching up or food the colony knows they can count on [PAWN_possessive] healing touch.

FT_Rooted_0.Name: Rooted
FT_Rooted_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is part tree! It takes more to bring [PAWN_name] down but also more to get [PAWN_objective] moving.

FT_LeadBelly_0.Name: Lead belly
FT_LeadBelly_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has a lead belly. [PAWN_possessive] belly can go much longer without food and [PAWN_pronoun] is more resistant to toxic radiation.

FT_Serendipitous_0.Name: Serendipitous
FT_Serendipitous_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is serendipitous, [PAWN_pronoun] seems to be a pretty lucky individual and [PAWN_pronoun]'s pretty happy about it too.

FT_GreenThumb_0.Name: Green thumb
FT_GreenThumb_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has a passion for gardening. [PAWN_pronoun] is quick when working with plants and recieves more bountiful yields when harvesting them.

FT_Tenderizer_0.Name: Tenderizer
FT_Tenderizer_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a tenderizer! [PAWN_pronoun] has a passion for beating meat into submission.

FT_FortuneFinder_0.Name: Fortune finder
FT_FortuneFinder_0.Description: [PAWN_name] seems to discover hidden wealth where ever [PAWN_pronoun] goes.

FT_BountifulButcher_0.Name: Bountiful butcher
FT_BountifulButcher_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a bountiful butcher! [PAWN_pronoun] isn't afraid to dig a little deeper to get what [PAWN_pronoun] wants.

FT_AnimalFriend_0.Name: Animal friend
FT_AnimalFriend_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has a passion for animals. [PAWN_pronoun] is adept at animal interactions and will bond with them more often. [PAWN_name] refuses to hunt animals.

FT_Magnetic_0.Name: Magnetic
FT_Magnetic_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has a magnetic body, literally! Somehow [PAWN_pronoun] able to use [PAWN_possessive] attractiveness on not just colonists, but metals too!.

FT_LifeGiver_0.Name: Life giver
FT_LifeGiver_0.Description: [PAWN_name] embodies wellness! Colonist who need treatment can rest easily knowing they have [PAWN_possessive]'s expertise keeping them alive.

FT_SpiritualHealer_0.Name: Spiritual healer
FT_SpiritualHealer_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a spiritual healer, [PAWN_pronoun] is a great doctor with good social skills. [PAWN_name] loves to grow and make [PAWN_possessive] own medicine.

FT_Ghoulish_0.Name: Ghoulish
FT_Ghoulish_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is still human, mostly. [PAWN_pronoun] is immune to the effects of toxic fallout and much harder to kill but [PAWN_possessive] ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.

FT_IdiotSavant_0.Name: Idiot savant
FT_IdiotSavant_0.Description: [PAWN_name] isn't stupid! [PAWN_pronoun] is just... different. [PAWN_pronoun] works through tasks slowly but learns extremely quickly. [PAWN_pronoun] is incapable performing intellectual, social or caring tasks.

FT_Stupid_0.Name: Stupid
FT_Stupid_0.Description: [PAWN_name] isn't very smart. [PAWN_pronoun] can mess up doing just about anything.

FT_Oblivious_0.Name: Oblivious
FT_Oblivious_0.Description: [PAWN_name] isn't very aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings, or anything at all really. [PAWN_pronoun]

FT_Woodchucker_0.Name: Woodchucker
FT_Woodchucker_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is part woodchuck! [PAWN_pronoun] wants everyone to think [PAWN_possessive] great woodworking skills are because of talent but everybody knows it's really because of those dang teeth.

FT_WreckingBall_0.Name: Wrecking ball
FT_WreckingBall_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a wrecking ball! [PAWN_pronoun] can push through building material like it's not even there. [PAWN_pronoun] really doesn't know [PAWN_possessive] own strength, often breaking things during construction.

FT_Perfectionist_0.Name: Perfectionist
FT_Perfectionist_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a perfectionist with a passion for art. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at construction but takes longer to complete tasks because [PAWN_pronoun] puts too much effort into making everything perfect.

FT_IronFist_0.Name: Iron fist
FT_IronFist_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has an iron fist! [PAWN_pronoun] can punch through foes like they are not even there. [PAWN_name] has a passion for melee combat and dislikes ranged weapons.

FEMB_FemboyTrait_0.Name: Femboy
FEMB_FemboyTrait_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a femboy. They are more likely to take on a feminine appearance and do not mind wearing gender-specific clothing.

maleGender_0.Name: Trans Male
maleGender_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} identifies strongly as a male. Physical traits related to the Male gender give mood boosts, while traits conflicting with it will give negative mood.

femaleGender_0.Name: Trans Female
femaleGender_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} identifies strongly as a female. Physical traits related to the Female gender give mood boosts, while traits conflicting with it will give negative mood.

androgyneGender_0.Name: Trans: Androgyne
androgyneGender_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} does not want to be identified as any gender. The closer to truly androgynous they are, the happier they are.

noGenderPref_0.Name: Body-content
noGenderPref_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is content with their body, regardless of their identified gender. They will experience no form of dysphoria.

bodySensitive_0.Name: Body-sensitive
bodySensitive_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is much more affected by dysphoria than normal.

TM_ArcaneConduitTD_0.Name: Arcane Conduit
TM_ArcaneConduitTD_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is abnormally receptive to the ebb and flow of mana, [PAWN_pronoun] will gain mana 40% faster than normal but [PAWN_possessive] maximum mana capacity is reduced by 20.

TM_ManaWellTD_0.Name: Mana Well
TM_ManaWellTD_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has an increased resistance to the ebb and flow of mana which allows [PAWN_objective] to hold an additional 40 mana, but reduces [PAWN_possessive] mana regeneration by 20%.

TM_BoundlessTD_0.Name: Boundless
TM_BoundlessTD_0.Description: [PAWN_name] excels at combat arts and is able to execute combat maneuvers 40% more frequently, however, [PAWN_possessive] talent has fostered an arrogant attitude that reduces [PAWN_possessive] experience gain by 25% and causes other fighters to dislike [PAWN_objective].

TM_FaeBloodTD_0.Name: Fae blood
TM_FaeBloodTD_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a descendant of fae folk and has a natural connection to the arcane. [PAWN_possessive] arcane resistance is reduced by 40% but mana regeneration and maximum mana is increased by 20%. Spell costs are reduced by 10%.

TM_GiantsBloodTD_0.Name: Giants blood
TM_GiantsBloodTD_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a descendant of giants - endowed with with great strength and stamina, though slow to recover. [PAWN_possessive] max stamina is increased by 80%, but stamina regeneration is reduced by 40%. Any attack made while using a melee weapon, or unarmed, deals an additional 25% damage.

TM_EnlightenedTD_0.Name: Enlightened
TM_EnlightenedTD_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is blessed by magic, able to harness its power without suffering the full side-effects. Psychic sensitivity is increased by 50% and any magic ability used only incurs half the normal arcane weakness.

TM_CursedTD_0.Name: Cursed
TM_CursedTD_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is cursed by magic - tormented by the constant, burning rush of power through [PAWN_possessive] being, and can only gain relief by expending arcane energy. [PAWN_name] will slowly accumulate arcane weakness up until [PAWN_pronoun] would become catatonic, and may become catatonic at any point while at this threshold. Using magical abilities that would normally incur arcane weakness will instead proportionally reduce arcane weakness, as well as the effects of the curse.

TM_OKWithDeath_0.Name: Unaffected by death
TM_OKWithDeath_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has accepted that death is another part of life and doesn't get upset when learning about a dead ally or seeing one of the undead.

Undead_0.Name: Undead
Undead_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has been reanimated as an undead.

TM_Gifted_0.Name: Magically gifted
TM_Gifted_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has a magical gift. [PAWN_pronoun] can harness this gift to become a mage by studying the mysterious secrets within an arcane script.

TM_Empath_0.Name: Empath
TM_Empath_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is an empath, able to feel and manipulate the emotions of those around [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_possessive]'s abilities are tied to magic, but have affected [PAWN_objective] on a more innate level. However, with training, [PAWN_name] can still become an adept magic user. For better or worse, empath's have a very strong presence and can easily read the presence of others; the effectiveness of their abilities are closely tied to their aptitude for overcoming another's defenses.

TM_Wanderer_0.Name: Wanderer
TM_Wanderer_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a wanderer; an outcast, half-breed mage class frequently dubbed a hedge-mage. [PAWN_possessive] carefree personality has kept [PAWN_possessive] from developing class abilities. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] has learned to improve on a vast number of utility abilities that allow [PAWN_objective] to adapt to any situation.
		
Wanderers prefer the open road and gain a mood boost for being in a caravan. Caravans with a wanderer will ignore the movement penalties of any world tile. However, their wanderlust will cause them to suffer a mood penalty for remaining at a colony for too long.

InnerFire_0.Name: Fire mage
InnerFire_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is attuned with the elements of fire.

HeartOfFrost_0.Name: Ice mage
HeartOfFrost_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is attuned with the elements of water.

StormBorn_0.Name: Lightning mage
StormBorn_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is attuned with the elements of lightning.

Arcanist_0.Name: Arcane mage
Arcanist_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is attuned with arcane forces, interacting directly with raw arcane power to move matter and energy at will.

Druid_0.Name: Druid
Druid_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is attuned with the forces of nature.

Paladin_0.Name: Paladin
Paladin_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has been bestowed with divine might and has sworn to uphold justice wherever [PAWN_pronoun] stands.

Summoner_0.Name: Summoner
Summoner_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is able to summon beings and materialize objects from other planes of existence.

Necromancer_0.Name: Necromancer
Necromancer_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is attuned with the forces of death.

Lich_0.Name: Lich
Lich_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has transformed into a lich, forsaking life in exchange for an power and an immortal existence. [PAWN_pronoun] disdains menial taks, choosing to employ undead for trivial matters.

Priest_0.Name: Priest
Priest_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is attuned with the forces of life and healing and has taken a vow against harming others.

TM_Bard_0.Name: Entertainer
TM_Bard_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a natural entertainer, able to lighten the mood and lift the spirits of everyone around [PAWN_objective].

TM_Bard_1.Name: Performer
TM_Bard_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is a performer; expanding on natural talent, [PAWN_pronoun] has begun to take an conscious role to improve the mood of other colonists.

TM_Bard_2.Name: Minstrel
TM_Bard_2.Description: Everyone loves being around [PAWN_name]. [PAWN_pronoun] has talent, wit and skill in many forms of entertainment and is able to make a personal connection with almost everyone.

TM_Bard_3.Name: Bard
TM_Bard_3.Description: [PAWN_name] is a master entertainer. Sharp wit, deft hands, and dry humor are [PAWN_possessive] weapons, and [PAWN_pronoun] is a master of all [PAWN_possessive] weapons.

Succubus_0.Name: Succubus
Succubus_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has a strange genetic strain that grants her enhanced physical attributes. She is also extremely attractive with an exotic facial structure that captures the eye. A succubus is more likely to exploit her physical advantages and have others do her work for her. [PAWN_possessive] succubus charm has its disadvantages and can cause some to become jealous and even despise [PAWN_objective].

Warlock_0.Name: Warlock
Warlock_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Warlock - able to manifest physical and demonic forces using his unique access to arcane power. The warlock shares the same genetic mixture as a succubus, but as a male, [PAWN_pronoun] is affected with mental enhancements that include clairvoyance and telekineses. The warlock can occasionally affect the outcome of a social interaction using their mental capabilities, regardless of how the interaction actually occurred.

Geomancer_0.Name: Geomancer
Geomancer_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is attuned with the earth and natural order, drawing power from the physical realm and intertwining it with arcane energy. [PAWN_pronoun] is capable of reinforcing physical elements, and bending them, as [PAWN_pronoun] needs.

Technomancer_0.Name: Technomancer
Technomancer_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has learned to see magic and science as two parts of the same force and is able to use arcane power to interface directly with components of technology. [PAWN_pronoun] is capable of manipulating objects with advanced mechanics, electronics, or computing it to achieve [PAWN_possessive] goals, but has difficulty interacting with biological systems.

BloodMage_0.Name: Blood Mage
BloodMage_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a blood mage and has consigned to the dark art of manipulating the life blood of living things as a means of increasing [PAWN_possessive] power.

As a blood mage, [PAWN_name] has learned to control the life force within and command it to [PAWN_possessive] will. [PAWN_possessive] connection to life makes it easier to associate with other living things, but doesn't appreciate effort without immediate results.

Enchanter_0.Name: Enchanter
Enchanter_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is an enchanter, attuned to the composition of matter and materials. [PAWN_pronoun] can manipulate matter to [PAWN_possessive] will, frequently in unnatural ways, and [PAWN_possessive] powers of transmutation can be permanent when sufficient effort is applied.

Chronomancer_0.Name: Chronomancer
Chronomancer_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a chronomancer. Through arcane sight, [PAWN_pronoun] is able to view reality as it once was and as it could be, and can manipulate objects between those realities.

ChaosMage_0.Name: Chaos Mage
ChaosMage_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has rejected all predefined magic paths and refuses to attribute objective reality in [PAWN_possessive] search for power; there are no truths, all magic is permitted. This tradition has enabled [PAWN_name] to learn any type of magic, although [PAWN_pronoun] will never master any.

TM_TheShadow_0.Name: Shadow
TM_TheShadow_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a half-breed demon with an affinity for shadow magic. [PAWN_pronoun] has developed [PAWN_possessive] unique talents through combat training and physical conditioning making [PAWN_objective] the perfect assassin.

TM_Brightmage_0.Name: Brightmage
TM_Brightmage_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a brightmage, able to harness the powers of light to purge evil. [PAWN_pronoun] approaches any task with an unrivaled fervor that usually places [PAWN_objective] at the forefront. Being a Brightmage introduces a dependency on the sun and light, because of this, [PAWN_name] has developed an intense hatred for shadowy and dark caricatures.

TM_Shaman_0.Name: Shaman
TM_Shaman_0.Description: Shamans take a more harmonious approach to arcane powers than most mages, choosing to pursue a path that works with the ebb and flow of magic to offset or enhance the natural order. [PAWN_name] is kin to the spirit realm and more attuned to nature and its elements.

TM_Golemancer_0.Name: Golemancer
TM_Golemancer_0.Description: Golemancers prefer to weave their magic through powerful runes and sigils that are able to transfer purpose into an object. [PAWN_name] is no exception; [PAWN_pronoun] can create runes that enhance basic mechanics, alter chemicals in biological matter, and animate mundane material into life-like, monstrous creatures. Golemancers are most effective when channeling their magic through symbols and find it more difficult to convert mana to energy directly but are also have higher arcane resistances. Most golemancers tend to find rocks more interesting than people and have little concern for cleanliness.

TM_Possessed_0.Name: Possessed
TM_Possessed_0.Description: The body of [PAWN_name] is inhabited by the spirit of another pawn. Possession in a living pawn creates an internal conflict as the functions of the body are shared between two souls. This conflict can be reduced if personalities align, but will become further aggravated if they contrast. Possession of a deceased pawn will not experience mental conflicts, but will slowly deplete the energy of the possessing spirit. Spirit can be recharged through meditation or absorption.

TM_Possessor_0.Name: Spirit
TM_Possessor_0.Description: The body of [PAWN_name] is inhabited by the spirit of another pawn. Possession in a living pawn creates an internal conflict as the functions of the body are shared between two souls. This conflict can be reduced if personalities align, but will become further aggravated if they contrast. Possession of a deceased pawn will not experience mental conflicts, but will slowly deplete the energy of the possessing spirit. Spirit can be recharged through meditation or absorption.

PhysicalProdigy_0.Name: Physically adept
PhysicalProdigy_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is physically adept and has potential to learn special combat forms.

TM_Wayfarer_0.Name: Wayfarer
TM_Wayfarer_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a wayfarer; an self-disciplined fighter that excels at tricks and dirty fighting. [PAWN_possessive] carefree personality has kept [PAWN_objective] from developing class abilities. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] has learned to improve a vast number of utility abilities that allow [PAWN_objective] to adapt to any situation.

Wayfarers prefer the open road and will gain a mood boost for being in a caravan, and any caravan with a wayfarer will travel 25% faster. However, wayfarers will suffer a mood penalty if they remain at colony for too long.

TM_Apothecary_0.Name: Apothecary
TM_Apothecary_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is an apothecary, trained in the preparation of medicines, balms, tinctures and drugs. [PAWN_possessive] profession exhibits strict discipline and dedication, and [PAWN_pronoun] has learned to apply [PAWN_possessive] discipline to more generic, physical skills. With training, [PAWN_pronoun] can become capable in many combat techniques to augment [PAWN_possessive] skill in herbs.

Gladiator_0.Name: Gladiator
Gladiator_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has learned how to train the Gladiator combat style.

Ranger_0.Name: Woodsman
Ranger_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a trained woodsman; preferring the silence and lethality of a bow and armed with field-craft and cunning, [PAWN_pronoun] is prepared to defend [PAWN_possessive] land from invaders.

Ranger_1.Name: Hunter
Ranger_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is a hunter; [PAWN_pronoun] employs field-craft, cunning, and skill with a bow to defend [PAWN_possessive] land from invaders.

Ranger_2.Name: Scout
Ranger_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is a scout; comfortable in the wilds, and relied upon to be the eyes and ears of a colony. [PAWN_pronoun] employs expertise in field-craft, cunning, and the bow to defend [PAWN_possessive] land from invaders.

Ranger_3.Name: Ranger
Ranger_3.Description: [PAWN_name] is a ranger; master of the wilds.  [PAWN_pronoun] is a master of [PAWN_possessive] craft and defender of [PAWN_possessive] land.

TM_Sniper_0.Name: Sharpshooter
TM_Sniper_0.Description: [PAWN_name] has trained to become a sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat. Training to become a sniper has caused some colonists to be uncomfortable around [PAWN_objective], not that [PAWN_pronoun] cares.

TM_Sniper_1.Name: Sniper
TM_Sniper_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has trained to become a sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat. Becoming a sniper has caused [PAWN_objective] to become distanced from other colonists and somewhat unapproachable, not that [PAWN_pronoun] cares.

TM_Sniper_2.Name: Master Sniper
TM_Sniper_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is a master sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat. Being a sniper has made [PAWN_objective] avoid other colonists, not that they care.

TM_Sniper_3.Name: Legendary Sniper
TM_Sniper_3.Description: [PAWN_name] is a legendary sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat.  Other colonists avoid eye contact and whisper in corners about how dangerous [PAWN_pronoun] is and that suits [PAWN_objective] just fine.

Bladedancer_0.Name: Bladesman
Bladedancer_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is training to become a master of the blade and excels at fighting in melee combat.

Bladedancer_1.Name: Blademaster
Bladedancer_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has trained to become a sword master, dangerously skilled in melee combat.

Bladedancer_2.Name: Bladedancer
Bladedancer_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is a blade dancer, highly skilled in melee combat.  Watching [PAWN_objective] fight is like watching a dance, every action precise and flawless as it flows from one form into another.

Bladedancer_3.Name: Legendary bladedancer
Bladedancer_3.Description: [PAWN_name] has become a legend, [PAWN_possessive] skill in melee combat is is known across the world. [PAWN_possessive] skill in combat makes it look as if each movement, each strike, is merely a stitch in a tapestry that depicts [PAWN_possessive] victory.

Faceless_0.Name: Faceless
Faceless_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a master of disguise and imitation; able to manipulate and capture the muscle and mental actions of another and release it as their own.

TM_Psionic_0.Name: Psionic
TM_Psionic_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a Psionic - able to manifest mental willpower into raw energy without the use of a psychic amplifier. [PAWN_pronoun] is able to project psionic energy but finds it easier and more efficient to apply it as an extension of [PAWN_possessive] body. For this reason, [PAWN_pronoun] prefers to be free of encumbering weapons when manifesting psionic energy.

[PAWN_name] has become less social since developing psionic powers, preferring to be unhindered by other pawns.

*The regeneration rate of psionic energy is based on psychic sensitivity - reducing sensitivity to 0 will prevent psionic energy from regenerating.

DeathKnight_0.Name: Death Knight
DeathKnight_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Death Knight - harbinger of doom and a representative of the ever approaching inevitability of death and decay. [PAWN_possessive] solemn attitude makes most pawns uneasy and even fewer approve of [PAWN_possessive] methods.

TM_Monk_0.Name: Monk
TM_Monk_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Monk, dedicated to mastering Chi - the energy that connects all life in the universe. [PAWN_pronoun] harnesses Chi to create magical effects and exceed [PAWN_possessive] physical capabilities. [PAWN_name] is also able to disrupt the Chi in others, affecting their command over spells and abilities.

TM_Commander_0.Name: Commander
TM_Commander_0.Description: As a Commander, [PAWN_name] exhibits a charismatic personality and stalwart presence that makes other pawns want to follow [PAWN_possessive] lead. Commander's utilize the weight of their presence to inspire nearby pawns, and when that's not enough, they can issue orders that drive their followers to victory. Because [PAWN_name] is used to everyone doing [PAWN_possessive] bidding, [PAWN_pronoun] considers menial tasks beneath [PAWN_possessive] status, and is generally a lackluster worker.

TM_SuperSoldier_0.Name: Super Soldier
TM_SuperSoldier_0.Description: [PAWN_name] is a highly trained Soldier, specializing in pistol, shotgun, or rifle weapons. [PAWN_possessive] weapon specialization is augmented by a standard set of combat training. Super Soldiers are trained to be aggressive and consider violence the natural solution to any argument.

TM_RedMage_4.Name: Red Mage
TM_RedMage_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Red Mage, a flourishing spellblade who weaves through combat with deadly flair.
TM_RedMage_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Ninja_4.Name: Ninja
TM_Ninja_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Ninja, a stealthy and agile fighter with a few magical tricks up their sleeves. They excel in bringing down enemies before they even know what hit them.
TM_Ninja_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_ElementalGunner_4.Name: Elemental Gunner
TM_ElementalGunner_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is an Elemental Gunner, a magically-gifted pawn capable of imbuing their ammunition with magical power. Their magically-heightened awareness allows them to shoot at frightening speeds. They specialize in laying down sustained suppressive fire.
TM_ElementalGunner_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Bombardier_4.Name: Bombardier
TM_Bombardier_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Bombardier, a fighter specializing in long-range explosive weaponry. They are experts at siege warfare, and can fire explosives over walls from behind cover.
TM_Bombardier_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Railbreaker_4.Name: Railbreaker
TM_Railbreaker_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Railbreaker, a reckless melee brawler equipped with extremely dangerous augments that allow them to create explosions at will, which they fire at point-blank range. They are unmatched in firepower, but their greatest weakness is the recoil from their own moves.
TM_Railbreaker_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Samurai_4.Name: Samurai
TM_Samurai_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Samurai, a wandering swordsman who specializes in Iai.
TM_Samurai_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Gadgeteer_4.Name: Gadgeteer
TM_Gadgeteer_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Gadgeteer, an eccentric inventor who carries around numerous gadgets and tools to assist them in daily life.
TM_Gadgeteer_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_WindMage_4.Name: Wind Mage
TM_WindMage_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Wind Mage, capable of bending the very air itself to their will.
TM_WindMage_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Medic_4.Name: Medic
TM_Medic_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Medic, a dedicated doctor with an array of powerful utility abilities that they can support their allies with. They are very poor direct combatants, however.
TM_Medic_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_ChromaMage_4.Name: Chroma Mage
TM_ChromaMage_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Chroma Mage, a versatile spellcaster capable of undertaking numerous paths of mastery. [PAWN_name] can learn any of several powerful spells, but they will never master them all. Their maximum level is 30.
TM_ChromaMage_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Harbinger_4.Name: Harbinger
TM_Harbinger_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Harbinger, a mage whose presence always signals death and destruction. They are capable of tapping into dark forces to curse their enemies, corrupting their body and soul. Due to their unique link with their victims, most of their spells do not require line of sight to cast.
TM_Harbinger_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Reaper_4.Name: Reaper
TM_Reaper_4.Description: No one knows of [PAWN_name]'s true origins, but in battle they seem more a demon than anything else. They are capable of flying directly into enemy positions unbidden and warping the minds of their enemies, causing discord and destruction.
TM_Reaper_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Berserker_4.Name: Berserker
TM_Berserker_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Berserker, a rampaging fighter who lives to kill or be killed.
TM_Berserker_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Scion_4.Name: Scion
TM_Scion_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Scion, a melee fighter that channels the aspects of ancient spirits to aid them both in combat and and in daily life.
TM_Scion_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Plaguedoctor_4.Name: Plaguedoctor
TM_Plaguedoctor_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Plaguedoctor, a half-crazed medieval physician who delights in poisons and disease. They are capable of performing uniquely terrifying surgical procedures on both allies and enemies.
TM_Plaguedoctor_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Cleric_4.Name: Cleric
TM_Cleric_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Cleric, a versatile mid-line healer capable of quickly healing and cleansing their allies.
TM_Cleric_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Arbormancer_4.Name: Arbormancer
TM_Arbormancer_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is an Arbormancer, a mage whose magic power is derived from living plants. They are not necessarily allies of the wood, however. They often earn the ire of Rangers and Druids through their wanton mistreatment of nature.
TM_Arbormancer_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Chainwarden_4.Name: Chainwarden
TM_Chainwarden_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Chainwarden, a fighter that has mastered the usage of chains as a combat weapon. They excel at controlling enemy movements and dealing with multiple opponents at once.
TM_Chainwarden_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Ambusher_4.Name: Ambusher
TM_Ambusher_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is an Ambusher, a fighter that lies in cold wait for their enemies with traps and devastating close-range abilities.
TM_Ambusher_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Saboteur_4.Name: Saboteur
TM_Saboteur_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Saboteur, a fighter that specializes in going behind enemy lines and disabling key enemy buildings and defenses.
TM_Saboteur_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Keeper_4.Name: Keeper
TM_Keeper_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Keeper, a mage that specializes in base defense.
TM_Keeper_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Pridestalker_4.Name: Pridestalker
TM_Pridestalker_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Pridestalker, a fighter that combines bow and magic to turn any fight into a deadly hunt.
TM_Pridestalker_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Starseeker_4.Name: Starseeker
TM_Starseeker_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Starseeker, a fledgling mage with incredible potential.
TM_Starseeker_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Aspirant_4.Name: Aspirant
TM_Aspirant_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is an Aspirant, a fledgling fighter with incredible potential.
TM_Aspirant_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Hawkeye_4.Name: Hawkeye
TM_Hawkeye_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Hawkeye, a fighter that has dedicated their life to the mastery of the bow.
TM_Hawkeye_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Atronach_4.Name: Atronach
TM_Atronach_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is an Atronach, an anomaly among spellcasters. They are capable of casting some powerful spells, but they are completely out of tune with the flow of magic and do not regenerate mana. They must find their own sources of mana with which to fuel their spells.
TM_Atronach_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_SupportSpecialist_4.Name: Support Specialist
TM_SupportSpecialist_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a versatile, shotgun-toting combat support, capable of taking out key targets, holding the line, or supporting allies.
TM_SupportSpecialist_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Scrapper_4.Name: Scrapper
TM_Scrapper_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Scrapper, a combatant that prefers unarmed brawling. They are unmatched in single combat with their huge array of single-target takedown moves.
TM_Scrapper_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Oracle_4.Name: Oracle
TM_Oracle_4.Description: Astrologian, fortune-teller, seer. As an Oracle, [PAWN_name] is all of these things, and more. As a mage that draws their power from the stars themselves, they are slow, deliberate spellcasters, but they are able to affect targets from anywhere on the map with their array of supportive spells.
TM_Oracle_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Mystic_4.Name: Mystic
TM_Mystic_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Mystic, a fighter that utilizes spiritual energy to disable and thwart their foes.
TM_Mystic_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Spellbreaker_4.Name: Spellbreaker
TM_Spellbreaker_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Spellbreaker, a fighter that excels at countering enemy attacks, and is adept at dealing with enemy fighters and mages.
TM_Spellbreaker_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Duskbringer_4.Name: Duskbringer
TM_Duskbringer_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Duskbringer, a combatant that has mastered the dual destructive forces of light and darkness.
TM_Duskbringer_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Thunderblessed_4.Name: Thunderblessed
TM_Thunderblessed_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a fighter with an incredible affinity for the element of lightning, despite not being a mage. They are capable of executing devastating attacks, but the physical toll of harnessing such power causes them to take more damage than others.
TM_Thunderblessed_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Deadeye_4.Name: Deadeye
TM_Deadeye_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a sharpshot mercenary for hire. It's not uncommon to find their ilk in dusty rimworld bars. Their ability to take out key targets from a distance is unparalleled, but life as a contract killer has left them less than willing to perform menial labor and daily tasks. They are capable of utilizing magic to make their bullets even more deadly, but they have no inherent mana regeneration of their own.
TM_Deadeye_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Spellthief_4.Name: Spellthief
TM_Spellthief_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Spellthief, a trickster mage capable of easily infiltrating and sabotaging enemies. They can copy abilities from allies and enemies.
TM_Spellthief_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Dragoon_4.Name: Dragoon
TM_Dragoon_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Dragoon, an agile knight that has absorbed the power of ancient dragons into their body, granting them extreme resistance towards heat. They are capable of taking to the skies to outmaneuever and destroy their opponents.
TM_Dragoon_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_BlackMage_4.Name: Black Mage
TM_BlackMage_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Black Mage, a specialized combat mage capable of unleashing unending destructive magic on their foes.
TM_BlackMage_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Scholar_4.Name: Scholar
TM_Scholar_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Scholar, a magical strategist capable of protecting their allies from harm. They are very poor direct combatants, but excel at supporting their allies in combat.
TM_Scholar_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Gunbreaker_4.Name: Gunbreaker
TM_Gunbreaker_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Gunbreaker, an unorthodox fighter that prefers to use ranged weaponry in melee combat. They are capable of charging up and unleashing devastating attacks in quick succession on their targets.
TM_Gunbreaker_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Gunner_4.Name: Machinist
TM_Gunner_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Machinist, a specialist fighter that prefers ranged weapons with powerful single-shot capabilities. They are capable of charging up and laying down rapid bursts of suppressive fire.
TM_Gunner_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Warrior_4.Name: Warrior
TM_Warrior_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Warrior, a melee fighter trained to survive on the front lines of battle.
TM_Warrior_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Nomad_4.Name: Nomad
TM_Nomad_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Nomad, a resilient and versatile bow-fighter that fights at both melee and range.
TM_Nomad_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Guardian_4.Name: Guardian
TM_Guardian_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Guardian, a stalwart protector that uses blade and magic to defend their allies.
TM_Guardian_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Holosmith_4.Name: Holosmith
TM_Holosmith_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Holosmith, an ordinary individual except for one thing -- their usage of the miraculous Photon Forge, which allows them to harness the power of light for brief periods of time, allowing them to keep up with other trained fighters.
TM_Holosmith_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Troubadour_4.Name: Troubadour
TM_Troubadour_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Troubadour, an archer who supports their allies with arrow and song.
TM_Troubadour_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Gambler_4.Name: Gambler
TM_Gambler_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Gambler, a smooth-talking vagrant with a magical deck of cards. They play out their lives according to fate's whim.
TM_Gambler_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Chef_4.Name: Chef
TM_Chef_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Chef, a dedicated cook with abilities that can ease the burdens of their allies.
TM_Chef_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Miner_4.Name: Miner
TM_Miner_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Miner, a trained specialist capable of demolishing ore and rock with ease.
TM_Miner_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Striker_4.Name: Striker
TM_Striker_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Striker, an unarmed combatant that is an aggressive offshoot of the Monk -- they forsake defense and healing in exchange for a swift and offensive combat style.
TM_Striker_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_RuneKnight_4.Name: Rune Knight
TM_RuneKnight_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Rune Knight, a specialized combat mage that compresses mana into runes to use at a later time, allowing them to prepare for future encounters. They have access to offensive, defensive, and healing magic.
TM_RuneKnight_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_BlossomBlader_4.Name: Blossom Blader
TM_BlossomBlader_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Blossom Blader, a graceful bladedancer with close ties to nature. They are capable of rapidly assaulting their targets with debilitating attacks. Their abilities are fueled by herbs gathered over time by interacting with plants.
TM_BlossomBlader_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Ravenous_4.Name: Ravenous
TM_Ravenous_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Ravenous. No one knows how these disturbing creatures come into existence - freak of nature, biological experimentation, or magical anomaly? The only thing anyone knows for sure is that these creatures must feed, on anything and everything. Despite not being properly trained, they are capable of learning fighter and mage abilities. Perhaps they devoured the knowledge from some unfortunate soul...
TM_Ravenous_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_MechHunter_4.Name: Mech Hunter
TM_MechHunter_4.Description: Some do it for vengeance, others do it for pay. Whatever the reason, [PAWN_name] is a Mech Hunter, a fighter that has dedicated their life to eradicating the Mechanoid threat.
TM_MechHunter_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Gunslinger_4.Name: Gunslinger
TM_Gunslinger_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Gunslinger, a mobile ranged attacker capable of blanketing the battlefield with suppressive fire.
TM_Gunslinger_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Shadowbringer_4.Name: Shadowbringer
TM_Shadowbringer_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Shadowbringer, a melee fighter that utilizes the power of darkness to annihilate their foes.
TM_Shadowbringer_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Warden_4.Name: Warden
TM_Warden_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is a Warden, an offshoot of the Geomancer that has received training as a battlemage and prefers to be in the thick of combat.
TM_Warden_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Chempunk_4.Name: Chempunk
TM_Chempunk_4.Description: No one belongs to a Rimworld more than [PAWN_name] - no stranger to pollution, poison, drugs, or violence, they have augmented their body to allow them to process dangerous drugs in combat, allowing them to use their very body as a poisonous weapon.
TM_Chempunk_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Explorer_4.Name: Explorer
TM_Explorer_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is an Explorer. Their travels through the land have granted them insight into numerous schools of both magic and might -- they are capable of learning abilities from almost any mage or fighter scroll. However, they possess no innate abilities of their own.
TM_Explorer_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

TM_Architect_4.Name: Architect
TM_Architect_4.Description: [PAWN_name] is an Architect, a mage that applies their magic to structures, allowing them to raise or destroy buildings at a moment's whim. Architects rarely directly engage their foes, they prefer to shape the landscape itself to be inhospitable to their enemies. Most of their spells can be cast from anywhere on the map.
TM_Architect_4.ModSource: Kure's Rimworld of Magic Class Expansion Pack

RGBmods_Autistic_GeniusIndoors_0.Name: Autistic
RGBmods_Autistic_GeniusIndoors_0.Description: [PAWN_name]'s brain works a little differently. [PAWN_pronoun] will be better suited to indoors activities, and needs more accomodations. But [PAWN_name] will be all the more efficient for them.

RGBmods_Autistic_GeniusOutdoors_0.Name: Autistic
RGBmods_Autistic_GeniusOutdoors_0.Description: [PAWN_name]'s brain works a little differently. [PAWN_pronoun] will be better suited to outdoor activities, and needs more accomodations and recreation time. But [PAWN_name] will be all the more efficient for them.

RGBmods_Autistic_GoodArtistic_0.Name: Autistic
RGBmods_Autistic_GoodArtistic_0.Description: [PAWN_name]'s brain works a little differently. [PAWN_pronoun] is a free soul who needs a nonverbal way to express [PAWN_possessive]self, special accomodations, and more recreation time.

RGBmods_Autistic_GoodConstruct_0.Name: Autistic
RGBmods_Autistic_GoodConstruct_0.Description: [PAWN_name]'s brain works a little differently. [PAWN_pronoun] has a deep passion for construction, and knows [PAWN_possessive] way around the craft. Careful not to overwork [PAWN_possessive]self, [PAWN_pronoun] needs special accomodations and more recreation time.

RGBmods_Autistic_GoodSocial_0.Name: Autistic
RGBmods_Autistic_GoodSocial_0.Description: [PAWN_name]'s brain works a little differently, but [PAWN_pronoun] absolutely loves people, and is pretty good with social interactions. [PAWN_pronoun] needs special accomodations and more recreation time.

RGBmods_Autistic_NeutralMining_0.Name: Autistic
RGBmods_Autistic_NeutralMining_0.Description: [PAWN_name]'s brain works a little differently. [PAWN_pronoun] has a passion for geology, but little else. [PAWN_possessive] needs in accomodations and recreation time are above average.

RGBmods_Autistic_NeutralCook_0.Name: Autistic
RGBmods_Autistic_NeutralCook_0.Description: [PAWN_name]'s brain works a little differently. [PAWN_pronoun] has a passion for food, but little else. [PAWN_possessive] needs in accomodations and recreation time are above average.

RGBmods_Autistic_BadPlants_0.Name: Autistic
RGBmods_Autistic_BadPlants_0.Description: [PAWN_name]'s brain works a little differently. [PAWN_pronoun] has a driving passion for field work, but isn't well suited to do much else. [PAWN_pronoun] needs special accomodations and lots of recreation time.

RGBmods_Autistic_BadAnimals_0.Name: Autistic
RGBmods_Autistic_BadAnimals_0.Description: [PAWN_name]'s brain works a little differently. [PAWN_pronoun] has a driving passion for taking care of animals, but isn't well suited to do much else. [PAWN_pronoun] needs special accomodations and lots of recreation time.

RGBmods_Autistic_BadMedical_0.Name: Autistic
RGBmods_Autistic_BadMedical_0.Description: [PAWN_name]'s brain works a little differently. [PAWN_pronoun] has a driving passion for doctoring, but isn't well suited to do much else. [PAWN_pronoun] needs special accomodations and lots of recreation time.

RGBmods_Autistic_TerribleNoWork_0.Name: Autistic
RGBmods_Autistic_TerribleNoWork_0.Description: [PAWN_name]'s brain works a little differently. [PAWN_pronoun] really can't do any work, and although [PAWN_pronoun] is autonomous enought to take care of [PAWN_possessive]self, [PAWN_pronoun] can't do much else. [PAWN_pronoun] will need special accomodations and lots of recreation time.

RGBmods_Autistic_TerribleMoody_0.Name: Autistic
RGBmods_Autistic_TerribleMoody_0.Description: [PAWN_name]'s brain works a little differently. [PAWN_pronoun] isn't well-suited to most work, and requires special accomodations and lots of recreation time. If [PAWN_possessive] needs aren't met, [PAWN_pronoun] becomes moody very easily.

VME_Elder_0.Name: Elder
VME_Elder_0.Description: Either the body or mind of {PAWN_nameDef} is one of insight and experience. While some find them old fashioned, others will respect their guidance.
VME_Elder_0.ModSource: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

VRE_Flirty_0.Name: Flirty
VRE_Flirty_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is always ready with a flirtatious comment or a playful compliment, lifting the spirits of those around {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} has a knack for making others feel special and desired, however this may sometimes lead to complicated situations when {PAWN_possessive} playful intentions are misinterpreted.

VRE_Distressed_0.Name: Distressed
VRE_Distressed_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is exceptionally empathetic and sensitive to the suffering of others. Whenever {PAWN_pronoun} witnesses pain or hardship, it deeply affects {PAWN_objective}, resulting in memories of these events haunting {PAWN_nameDef} for a much longer time.

VTE_AbsentMinded_0.Name: Absent-minded
VTE_AbsentMinded_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} tends to let {PAWN_possessive} mind drift, even in the middle of work. {PAWN_pronoun} may sometimes stop tasks at random.

VTE_Eccentric_0.Name: Eccentric
VTE_Eccentric_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a screw loose, but it comes with a sharper scientific mind.

VTE_Perfectionist_0.Name: Perfectionist
VTE_Perfectionist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} strives for perfection in {PAWN_possessive} work. {PAWN_pronoun} produces higher-quality products, but works more slowly. Failing to meet {PAWN_possessive} standards causes unhappiness, and on rare occasions {PAWN_pronoun} may abandon a project mid-way.

VTE_Coward_0.Name: Coward
VTE_Coward_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s instincts lean heavily toward cowardice. In danger, {PAWN_pronoun} will often hide or run before standing to fight.

VTE_Brave_0.Name: Brave
VTE_Brave_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has stronger mental and physical fortitude than most. {PAWN_pronoun} can endure pain more readily, and is slower to break under harsh conditions.

VTE_Clumsy_0.Name: Clumsy
VTE_Clumsy_0.Description: Minor bruises and scrapes plague {PAWN_nameDef}, usually from tripping or falling due to poor coordination.

VTE_HeatInclined_0.Name: Heat inclined
VTE_HeatInclined_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the heat of a dry summer day. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in warmth.

VTE_ColdInclined_0.Name: Cold inclined
VTE_ColdInclined_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the chill of a brisk winter night. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind shivering or sleeping in the cold.

VTE_HeavySleeper_0.Name: Heavy sleeper
VTE_HeavySleeper_0.Description: A bomb could go off beside {PAWN_nameDef} while {PAWN_pronoun} sleeps, and {PAWN_pronoun} would keep right on sleeping. {PAWN_pronoun} can't be bothered to work or defend the colony mid-nap.

VTE_Neat_0.Name: Neat
VTE_Neat_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is naturally hygienic and organized. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't track dirt or scatter trash, and enjoys cleaning.

VTE_Slob_0.Name: Slob
VTE_Slob_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is naturally sloppy, leaving trash and dirt scattered around. At least {PAWN_pronoun} isn't much bothered by messy surroundings.

VTE_Workaholic_0.Name: Workaholic
VTE_Workaholic_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} struggles to take breaks or rest mid-job. {PAWN_pronoun} will keep working, even at the expense of {PAWN_possessive} health or sleep.

VTE_IronStomach_0.Name: Iron stomach
VTE_IronStomach_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has never known nausea. Food poisoning and vomiting are foreign to {PAWN_objective}.

VTE_AnimalLover_0.Name: Animal lover
VTE_AnimalLover_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} can't stand cruelty toward animals. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when nuzzled or acting as master to a tamed animal, but is more deeply upset when losing one. {PAWN_pronoun} also refuses to butcher animals.

VTE_AnimalHater_0.Name: Animal hater
VTE_AnimalHater_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes in human superiority over animals. {PAWN_pronoun} dislikes bonding or being nuzzled, but feels satisfaction when animals die or are sold.

VTE_BigBoned_0.Name: Big-boned
VTE_BigBoned_0.Description: Whether from bulk or awkward posture, {PAWN_nameDef} has broken a few chairs in {PAWN_possessive} time, and is likely to break more.

VTE_Rebel_0.Name: Rebel
VTE_Rebel_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} only plays by {PAWN_possessive} own rules. When forced, {PAWN_pronoun} will drag {PAWN_possessive} feet and work more slowly.

VTE_Submissive_0.Name: Submissive
VTE_Submissive_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} needs clear direction on when and how to act. {PAWN_pronoun} works at normal speed only when ordered, and otherwise slows down.

VTE_Vengeful_0.Name: Vengeful
VTE_Vengeful_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is fueled by spite. {PAWN_pronoun} cant stand sharing the colony with rivals, and feels happier when one of them dies.

VTE_Technophobe_0.Name: Technophobe
VTE_Technophobe_0.Description: Whether from trauma or fear of change, {PAWN_nameDef} rejects modernity. {PAWN_pronoun} may lash out at machines, refuses to research, and feels satisfaction from destroying mechanoids.

VTE_FunLoving_0.Name: Fun-loving
VTE_FunLoving_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} lives for a good time. {PAWN_pronoun} remembers parties fondly, and the joy lasts far longer than it does for most.

VTE_Dunce_0.Name: Dunce
VTE_Dunce_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has limited mental capacity. {PAWN_pronoun} learns slowly and struggles with conversation, but tends to be naturally happy.

VTE_MartialArtist_0.Name: Martial artist
VTE_MartialArtist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has trained in melee combat and learned a special move to disarm opponents.

VTE_Snob_0.Name: Snob
VTE_Snob_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.

VTE_Squeamish_0.Name: Squeamish
VTE_Squeamish_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gets a sour stomach around blood or corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for {PAWN_objective}.

VTE_Anxious_0.Name: Anxious
VTE_Anxious_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is naturally anxious, especially in social situations. {PAWN_pronoun} avoids gatherings and sometimes retreats to {PAWN_possessive} room to cope.

VTE_Insatiable_0.Name: Insatiable
VTE_Insatiable_0.Description: No amount of lovin is ever enough for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} tends to move between partners and seeks intimacy often.

VTE_Prude_0.Name: Prude
VTE_Prude_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gives {PAWN_possessive} body only to a spouse and would never initiate divorce. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes nudity more than most.

VTE_CouchPotato_0.Name: Couch potato
VTE_CouchPotato_0.Description: An armchair and a screen are all {PAWN_nameDef} needs to be happy. {PAWN_pronoun} never tires of watching television, and always feels good after.

VTE_CatPerson_0.Name: Cat person
VTE_CatPerson_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the company of cats and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes dogs.

VTE_DogPerson_0.Name: Dog person
VTE_DogPerson_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the company of dogs and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes cats.

VTE_Prodigy_0.Name: Prodigy
VTE_Prodigy_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a sharp, logical mind. {PAWN_pronoun} researches faster than most, and {PAWN_possessive} rational outlook makes {PAWN_objective} less prone to mental breaks.

VTE_Menagerist_0.Name: Menagerist
VTE_Menagerist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes animals are essential to life and society. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier with more of them around, and is especially skilled at taming and training.

VTE_ChildOfSea_0.Name: Ocean lover
VTE_ChildOfSea_0.Description: The sea calls to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when near the ocean or a deep river.

VTE_ChildOfMountain_0.Name: Mountain lover
VTE_ChildOfMountain_0.Description: The mountains call to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when near a large mountain.

VTE_MadSurgeon_0.Name: Mad surgeon
VTE_MadSurgeon_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} hides a twisted obsession. {PAWN_pronoun} treats organ harvesting as a dark experiment and takes pleasure in it. Harvesting makes {PAWN_objective} happy, but going too long without fuels growing unrest.

VTE_DrunkenMaster_0.Name: Drunken master
VTE_DrunkenMaster_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} fights best when drunk. {PAWN_pronoun} grows more dangerous in melee the more intoxicated {PAWN_pronoun} becomes.

VTE_Kleptomaniac_0.Name: Kleptomaniac
VTE_Kleptomaniac_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is compelled to steal, even from guests and allies, risking angering others.

VTE_Stoner_0.Name: Stoner
VTE_Stoner_0.Description: Smokeleaf is a way of life for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} adores it and would rather die than give it up.

VTE_Lush_0.Name: Lush
VTE_Lush_0.Description: Alcohol is a way of life for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} adores drinking and would rather die than give it up.

VTE_Wanderlust_0.Name: Wanderlust
VTE_Wanderlust_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves to travel and feels happiest on the move. {PAWN_pronoun} grows restless when staying too long in one place, but moves quickly and forages well while caravanning.

VTE_Insomniac_0.Name: Insomniac
VTE_Insomniac_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is never fully asleep or awake. {PAWN_pronoun} lurches along in a slow, shambler-like state, and only sleeps once every few days.

VTE_WorldWeary_0.Name: World weary
VTE_WorldWeary_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has grown tired of the world. {PAWN_pronoun} struggles with bleak thoughts, making {PAWN_possessive} personality difficult to befriend.

VTE_Desensitized_0.Name: Desensitized
VTE_Desensitized_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is hardened by old emotional trauma. {PAWN_pronoun} feels nothing from death or loss, whether animal, colonist, family, or prisoner.

VTE_RefinedPalate_0.Name: Refined palate
VTE_RefinedPalate_0.Description: Only the finest meals satisfy {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels indifferent toward ordinary food, but savors lavish meals and gains greater joy from them.

VTE_Academian_0.Name: Academian
VTE_Academian_0.Description: Through scholastic pursuit, {PAWN_nameDef} has become well-read. {PAWN_pronoun} excels in science and medicine, and tends patients with greater skill.

VTE_Groundbreaker_0.Name: Groundbreaker
VTE_Groundbreaker_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes infrastructure is everything. {PAWN_pronoun} is a natural builder and stoneworker, constructing and mining with greater speed and efficiency.

VTE_Gastronomist_0.Name: Gastronomist
VTE_Gastronomist_0.Description: To {PAWN_nameDef}, food is art. {PAWN_pronoun} creates beautiful, delicious meals that are almost always safe to eat.

VTE_Ecologist_0.Name: Ecologist
VTE_Ecologist_0.Description: Flora and fauna are vital to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} uses every part of plants and animals, and appreciates natures gifts.

VTE_Tycoon_0.Name: Tycoon
VTE_Tycoon_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an eye for silver and a silver tongue to match. {PAWN_pronoun} values {PAWN_possessive} own goods highly, and convinces others to do the same.

VTE_ThickSkinned_0.Name: Thick skinned
VTE_ThickSkinned_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.

VTE_ThinSkinned_0.Name: Thin skinned
VTE_ThinSkinned_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.

VTE_Schizoid_0.Name: Schizoid
VTE_Schizoid_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} bottles up {PAWN_possessive} feelings for long stretches of time. When the pressure grows too great, {PAWN_pronoun} may suddenly break down.

AG_Beauty_2.Name: Angelic beauty
AG_Beauty_2.Description: [PAWN_name] possesses an unnatural, almost pristine beauty that makes [PAWN_objective] stand out among others of [PAWN_possessive] kind.

AG_Beauty_-2.Name: Repulsive
AG_Beauty_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is so unfathomably ugly and grotesque that merely looking at [PAWN_objective] is enough to make other people nauseous.
